help_general:
📱 *General Commands*
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

`/start` - Start the bot
`/help` - Show this help message
`/language` - Change the bot's language
`/support` - Access the support system
help_admin:
👑 *Admin Commands*
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

`/approve <user_id>` - Approve a user
`/activate <user_id>` - Activate a user
`/deactivate <user_id>` - Deactivate a user
`/addadmin <user_id>` - Add a new admin
`/removeadmin <user_id>` - Remove an admin
`/listadmins` - Show all admins
`/pending` - Show pending users
`/stats <user_id>` - Show user statistics
help_trading:
💹 *Trading Commands*
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Select from the menu to:

• Choose OTC or Regular assets
• Select currency pairs
• Set trading timeframes
help_support:
💬 *Support System*
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

`/support` - Access the support system

• Create new support tickets
• View your existing tickets
• Reply to support messages
• Close or reopen tickets
help_footer:
💡 *Need more help?*
Use `/support` to create a support ticket.
support_ticket_created_success:
🎉 Great! Your support ticket has been created successfully!

Ticket ID: {ticket_id}
Status: Open

Our support team will review your ticket and get back to you soon. You can check the status of your ticket anytime using the /support command.
support_ticket_sent:
✅ Your message has been sent to support.
We'll get back to you soon!
support_no_tickets: 📋 You have no active support tickets.
support_ticket_list:

{tickets}

Click on a ticket to view its details.

main_menu:
🤖 *Trading Bot Menu*
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Select an option to begin:
favorites_empty:
⭐ You haven't added any pairs to your favorites yet.
To add pairs, select them from Regular or OTC assets and click the star button.
main_menu_warning: ⚠️ *Important: This is not a button for easy money! Remember risk management 💰 and discipline 📊*
welcome_status_admin: As an admin, you have access to additional commands and features.
welcome_status_approved: Your account is approved and ready to use.
welcome_status_pending: Your account is pending approval. Please wait for admin confirmation.
welcome_status_back_admin: Ready to manage and monitor the system.
welcome_status_back_pending: You're in trial mode. Limited signals available.
pair_menu_prompt: Please select an expiration time for analysis:
welcome_promo: 🚀 Ready to start trading? Sign up here to get started with our platform!
trade_feedback_thanks: Thank you! Your feedback has been recorded.
mode_smc_active: 🧠 **SMC Mode Active** - Pure Smart Money Concepts
mode_smc_description:
• Higher accuracy, fewer signals
• Best for trending markets
mode_standard_description:
• More opportunities, moderate accuracy
• Best for ranging markets
mode_info_standard_desc:
• Combines traditional technical analysis with SMC concepts
• **Indicators:** RSI, Support/Resistance, Candlestick patterns, MACD, Bollinger Bands, Moving Averages
• **Signal Priority:** SMC first, then traditional TA fallback
• **Flexibility:** Higher (requires 2-3 conditions)
• **Best For:** Beginners, ranging markets, higher frequency trading
• **Risk:** Medium (more signals, moderate accuracy)
mode_info_smc_desc:
• Uses exclusively institutional trading concepts
• **Features:** Swing analysis, Break of Structure (BOS), Order Blocks, Fair Value Gaps (FVG), Liquidity levels
• **Signal Priority:** SMC only (no fallback)
• **Flexibility:** Lower (strict validation required)
• **Best For:** Experienced traders, trending markets, higher conviction trades
• **Risk:** Lower (fewer signals, higher accuracy)
mode_info_standard_when:
• **Use Standard Mode when:**
  - Market is ranging/sideways
  - You want more trading opportunities
  - You're learning trading concepts
  - Volatility is low
mode_info_smc_when:
• **Use SMC Mode when:**
  - Market is trending strongly
  - You want higher quality signals
  - You're experienced with SMC
  - Volatility is high
mode_info_switch: 🔄 **Switch Modes:** Use the toggle button in the main menu
mode_info_track: 📊 **Track Performance:** Check your trade results for mode-specific stats
mode_stats_better_standard: ⚡ Standard Mode is currently performing better
mode_stats_better_smc: 🧠 SMC Mode is currently performing better
mode_toggle_smc_enabled: 🧠 SMC Mode enabled! All signals will use Smart Money Concepts logic.
mode_toggle_standard_enabled: ⚡ Standard Mode enabled! All signals will use retail TA logic.
help_analysis_desc:
• Select assets from Regular or OTC menu
• Choose timeframes (1m, 3m, 5m, 15m, 30m, 1h)
• Use 'Analyze All' for multiple pairs
• Use 'Find Best Opportunity' for top signals
help_mode_desc:
• Toggle between Standard and SMC modes
• Use Mode Info button for detailed explanations
• Track performance in trade results
help_favorites_desc:
• Add/remove pairs to favorites
• Quick access to preferred assets
help_admin_desc:
• /modestats - View mode performance (admin only)
• /modeinfo - Show mode information
• Various admin management commands
